message.body: Hi ######## does your office know your going through the police process?
Question what's the best time to come here? Trying to still figure out this place LOL
Hey, my immediate manager knows (woman at the back desk - #####) but the higher ups dont know yet
Just wondering it's always good to keep it on the down low a lot of people dislike cops!! Well anything u need let me know. Good luck

Lol yea (the disliking part). I mainly keep it on the down low bec my company fires people for no reason most of the time and especially around the holidays. Not trying to lose my job before the academy is definite! And thanks, ill be keeping you posted haha
